name: ROPIVACAINE HYDROCHLORIDE
indications: ropivacaine hydrochloride indicated production local regional anesthesia surgery acute pain management . surgical anesthesia : epidural block surgery including cesarean section ; major nerve block ; local infiltration acute pain management : epidural continuous infusion intermittent bolus , e.g . , postoperative labor ; local infiltration
warningsAndPrecautions: ropivacaine hydrochloride injection usp clear colorless , preservative-free solution , available single-dose containers 2 mg/ml ( 0.2 % ) , 5 mg/ml ( 0.5 % ) 10 mg/ml ( 1 % ) concentrations . storage solutions stored 20 °c 25 °c ( 68 °f 77 °f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . ropivacaine hydrochloride injection single-dose , ready-to-use , polypropylene flexible bags overwrapped aluminum pouch . flexible bag container made natural rubber latex polyvinyl chloride ( pvc ) , non-dehp . ndc strength size ndc 70512-797-01 200 mg/100 ml ( 2 mg/ml ) 100 ml infusion bag ndc 70512-798-01 400 mg/200 ml ( 2 mg/ml ) 250 ml infusion bag ropivacaine hydrochloride container closure made natural rubber latex . products intended single-dose free preservatives . discard unused portion .
adverseReactions: ropivacaine hydrochloride contraindicated patients known hypersensitivity ropivacaine local anesthetic agent amide type .
indications_original:
Ropivacaine Hydrochloride is indicated for the production of local or regional anesthesia for surgery and for acute pain management.
                  
                     Surgical Anesthesia: epidural block for surgery including cesarean section; major nerve block; local infiltration

 
                  
                     Acute Pain Management: epidural continuous infusion or intermittent bolus, e.g., postoperative or labor; local infiltration
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Ropivacaine hydrochloride Injection USP is a clear colorless, and preservative-free solution, available in single-dose containers in 2 mg/mL (0.2%), 5 mg/mL (0.5%) and 10 mg/mL (1%) concentrations.
                  
                     Storage 
   
                        
                     Solutions should be stored at 20 °C to 25 °C (68 °F to 77 °F) [See USP Controlled Room Temperature].

 
                  
                     Ropivacaine hydrochloride injection 
                     single-dose, ready-to-use, polypropylene flexible bags overwrapped with aluminum pouch. The flexible bag container is not made with natural rubber latex or polyvinyl chloride (PVC), Non-DEHP.
                  
                  
                     
                        
                           
                              NDC No
                           
                           
                              Strength
                           
                           
                              Size
                           
                        
                        
                           NDC 70512-797-01
                           200 mg/100 mL (2 mg/mL)
                           100 mL infusion bag
                        
                        
                           NDC 70512-798-01
                           400 mg/200 mL (2 mg/mL)
                           250 mL Infusion bag
                        
                     
                  
                  Ropivacaine hydrochloride container closure is not made with natural rubber latex. 
  
                       These products are intended for single-dose and are free from preservatives. Discard Unused Portion.
adverseReactions_original: Ropivacaine hydrochloride is contraindicated in patients with a known hypersensitivity to ropivacaine or to any local anesthetic agent of the amide type.
